title: Nakeru BL
sinopse:
A collection of works by various BL mangaka.

1. Umi to Heavy Smoker [Eda Yuuri x Mineshima Nawako]
2. Tora to Tou-chan Saigo no Ichinichi [Aruku]
3. Stroboscope [Yamashita Tomoko]
4. Erabareru Yoru [Momoka]
5. Tooi Hi no Atosaki (The Consequences of a Faraway Day) [Moto Haruhira]
6. Kimi dake ni Ai wo. [Kawai Hideki]
7. Kigengire no Hatsukoi [Konohara Narise x Itoi Nozo]
